attributes.action: I Want the Cardigan Wearer of the Year Award Created!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Shug Taylor of the St Johnstone Business Club has been a proud wearer of the cardigan garment for much of this year and i feel that due to his continued support and display of the cardigan garment i would petition the Prime Minister and his government to put aside the worlds woes for one minute and award Shug with his rightful award. Please sign this petition if you support our efforts to bestow Shug with his much earned title. God Save the Cardigan!!!!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
